rows.label: qst001006_msg0001
rows.name: U-um!

rows.label: qst001006_msg0002
rows.name: I have a request!

rows.label: qst001006_msg0003
rows.name: Please make me your apprentice!

rows.label: qst001006_msg0004
rows.name: My dad and mom were Drivers in Gula.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0005
rows.name:
But they were betrayed by
their comrades and killed...

rows.label: qst001006_msg0006
rows.name: Vandham-san took me and my sister in.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0007
rows.name:
I'm grateful, but... my
sister still seems lonely.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0008
rows.name:
She often says she wanted to
finish the whole plate of
grass-smoked salmon my mom made...

rows.label: qst001006_msg0009
rows.name:
Every time I hear her say
that, I get so angry...

rows.label: qst001006_msg0010
rows.name: I swear I'll get revenge!

rows.label: qst001006_msg0011
rows.name:
To give back to this village,
the kids and I gather food
and materials, but...

rows.label: qst001006_msg0012
rows.name:
I don't think I'll ever get
stronger doing that...

rows.label: qst001006_msg0013
rows.name:
I want to resonate with the
Core Crystal my dad left me
as soon as possible...

rows.label: qst001006_msg0014
rows.name:
So please, train me and make
me a first-class Driver!

rows.label: qst001006_msg0015
rows.name: How should we respond?

rows.label: qst001006_msg0016
rows.name: Stop him from seeking revenge.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0017
rows.name:
Tell him it's fine to
continue as he is.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0201
rows.name: I should have known adults...

rows.label: qst001006_msg0202
rows.name:
I thought you of all people
would understand...!

rows.label: qst001006_msg0203
rows.name: That's the right answer.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0204
rows.name:
The little mercenary game he's
playing is enough for now.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0205
rows.name:
He shouldn't want to become a
Driver just to kill people.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0206
rows.name:
...It must be tough for
him now, but I'm sure
he'll understand one day.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0207
rows.name:
Revenge creates nothing. It
just leads to a vicious cycle.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0208
rows.name: Anyway, thank you for saving the kids.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0209
rows.name:
I'll keep a closer eye
on them from now on.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0301
rows.name: Is what I'm doing now really enough...?

rows.label: qst001006_msg0302
rows.name:
I was hoping for some advice on the
tricks and mindset of a Driver, or
training I should be doing now...

rows.label: qst001006_msg0303
rows.name:
Hey, Jillwood, don't
trouble them too much.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0304
rows.name: No, but...

rows.label: qst001006_msg0305
rows.name:
Your little mercenary
game is enough for now.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0306
rows.name: No one is born a Driver.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0307
rows.name: There's no need to rush.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0308
rows.name: Yeah... I get it...

rows.label: qst001006_msg0309
rows.name:
We'll keep focusing on
finding food and materials
to help the mercenary band.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0310
rows.name:
That experience will be
useful in the future, right?

rows.label: qst001006_msg0311
rows.name: Thanks for listening to me!

rows.label: qst001006_msg0312
rows.name:
I'm definitely going
to become a Driver!
